title: Implement beads namespace and ShooterBeadsInit command
description: Shot from beads.md: Create new namespace beads in the project and add cmd ShooterBeadsInit to it.

title: Introduce sub projects feature
description: Shot 305: Introduce sub projects in shooter.nvim. Allow organizing work by sub-projects within a repository.

title: Implement subproject folder configuration in session settings
description: Shot 314: Configure folders for sub projects separately in the session settings. The projects filter should have per-subproject folder configuration.

title: Add move to project and move to repo commands
description: Shot 350: Add move to project command and move to repo command for file movement.

title: Fix audit report opening error
description: Shot 293: When pressing yes to open the audit report, it throws an error.

title: Add plenary to checkhealth command
description: Shot 290: Add plenary.nvim to the :checkhealth shooter integration for dependency validation.
